quotes.quote: He who sings frightens away his ills.
Some days there won't be a song in your heart. Sing anyway.
There's no half-singing in the shower, you're either a rock star or an opera diva.
Those who wish to sing always find a song.
As long as we live, there is never enough singing.
For me, singing is the most natural thing in the world. I've grown up with it and I know I've got that gift.
Let us go singing as far as we go: the road will be less tedious.
The only thing better than singing is more singing.
Singing is a way of escaping. It's another world. I'm no longer on earth.
A lot of work. A lot of vocal coaching, a lot of instrument training.
It is the best of all trades, to make songs, and the second best to sing them.
You chose the toughest song to sing tonight . . . and you worked it out.
Singing is just a feeling set to music.
Singing provides a true sense of lightheartedness. If I sing when I am alone, I feel wonderful. It's freedom.
When a singer truly feels and experiences what the music is all about, the words will automatically ring true.
I don't know what happens to me on stage. Something else seems to take over.
Sing again, with your dear voice revealing A tone Of some world far from ours, Where music and moonlight and feeling Are one.
On singing in the swimming pool: "If I can move the water, I can move the people."
If they're singing about heartbreak, they've lived it.
We sing because we can't speak anymore.
You can cage the singer but not the song.
The total person sings not just the vocal chords.
Singing allowed me to express myself in ways that I wouldn't be able to do otherwise.
Singing is my life. It has always been my life. It will always be my life.
If you're gonna sing, sing loud.
Singing is such an excellent thing, that I wish all people would sing.
There is delight in singing, though none hear beside the singer.
A song can be more than words and music ... when sung with soul a song carries you to another world, to a place where no matter how much pain you feel, you are never alone.
He who sings prays twice.
Singing evokes the temple of the soul.
